title: Weddings
name: Weddings
description:
A Map by Deisnor

A map of wedding stories and locations.

properties.name: Fragile Industries Studios - Custom Wedding Supplies
properties.description: Posted by Fragileindustry  93003Custom wedding scrapbooks, guest books, books of your vows or ceremony, artwork from your wedding photo(s), favors, gifts for weddings or showers, gifts for the wedding party, and anything else you can think of that\'s wedding related! I personalize these items with your theme and/or photos or other personal mememtoes. My style can be vintage, retro, elegant, shabby chic, or just about anything, but always unique! These items become treasured keepsakes for a lifetime and more. My art work is collected all over the world and has toured with mixed media exhibitions nationally. I can ship to any US or Canada location. I also create altered books, shrines and lots more, either custom or ready-made and ready to sell. Visit my site for more info!

properties.name: The church I married Heide in.
properties.description: Posted by JasonbackusMoses Lake, WASorry ladies. This is the end of the road for you. The love of my life agreed to be my wife at this exact spot on Feb. 6th, 1996. Silly girl. Plus, my mom told her that I was non-returnable, so that pretty much puts an end to my prowling. ;-) Plus, I mean, look at her. She\'s hot.

properties.name: where we got married
properties.description: Posted by Coffywoman1 Chaminade Lane, Santa Cruz, CAWe had a vegan wedding at the Chaminade co-officiated by our friend Heather and Rabbi Gershon. Chaminade was very accommodating and allowed us to bring in our own vegan cake from Black China Bakery and to pick out our appetizers and entrees. We gave them recipes from the Millennium cookbook which they prepared specially for the big shindig! Lucky for us, the weather gave us a break, too, and it didn\'t rain on the actual wedding day!
